definition: horse thief/(old) group of horse-mounted bandits
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
thief/traitor/wily/deceitful/evil/extremely

sentences.english: One of my friends killed some horse thieves a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月之前我有個朋友在這裏殺了一幫馬賊。

sentences.english: He carries a gun to fight off Indians and cattle thieves.
sentences.chinese: 他僅用手槍就能打退印第安人和盜馬賊的侵犯。
